articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of the French Open as Cameron Norrie faces Novak Djokovic on day nine at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Norrie v Djokovic, Bublik v Draper - scores, results & order of play at Roland Garros

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper is given a reality check as world number 62 Alexander Bublik produces a stunning performance to reach the French Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Jack Draper loses to Alexander Bublik in Roland Garros last 16

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola has put Rayan Ait-Nouri at the top of his list to solve his side's problematic left-back spot.
articles.title: Rayan Ait-Nouri: Manchester City target Wolves defender

articles.description: World number 361 Lois Boisson pulls off the biggest shock of this year's French Open with a stunning fourth-round victory against third seed Jessica Pegula.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Lois Boisson stuns Jessica Pegula

articles.description: Sri Lanka will host games at this year’s Women’s World Cup as part of ongoing arrangements for India and Pakistan matches.
articles.title: Women's Cricket World Cup 2025: Sri Lanka to host Pakistan matches

articles.description: Novak Djokovic ends Cameron Norrie's encouraging French Open run with a straight-set victory to reach the quarter-finals.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Novak Djokovic beats Cameron Norrie to reach Roland Garros quarter-finals

articles.description: Max Verstappen says that "frustration" led to his collision with George Russell during the Spanish Grand Prix and that the move "was not right and shouldn't have happened".
articles.title: Max Verstappen-George Russell collision: F1 world champion admits move 'was not right'

articles.description: Maurizio Sarri rejoins Lazio as head coach - 15 months after leaving the role.
articles.title: Maurizio Sarri: Lazio appoint former boss for second spell in charge

articles.description: Iain Carter pays tribute to the quality of Scottie Scheffler and Maja Stark's performances as well as the historical significance of their wins.
articles.title: Golf: Scottie Scheffler and Maja Stark evoke memories of legends

articles.description: Barcelona sporting director Deco says they are now a well-run club who do not need to sell players this summer.
articles.title: Deco on Barcelona's financial future, challenging Real Madrid and Lamine Yamal
